Texto: 
tender left lower quadrant.
axial ct image after iv and enteric contrast demonstrates circumferential thickening of the sigmoid colon with a large amount of adjacent fat stranding.  also diverticuli are present.
diverticulitis
diverticulitis
epiploic appendigitis
58 y/o male with left lower quadrant abdominal pain and fever.
